config.label: Items
config.name: items
config.helpText: Elements of the carousel. You can add as many as you want.

arrayContent.label: SRC
arrayContent.name: src
arrayContent.helpText: URL of the image to show at the top of the card. If it is not filled it will not be displayed.

arrayContent.label: Alt
arrayContent.name: alt
arrayContent.helpText: Alternative text of the image to be displayed if the image is not loaded.

arrayContent.label: Link
arrayContent.name: href
arrayContent.helpText: If you fill it, clicking on the card will redirect to the indicated url.

arrayContent.label: Title
arrayContent.name: title
arrayContent.helpText: Title of the card link if you have filled in the Link field.

arrayContent.label: Classes
arrayContent.name: classes
arrayContent.helpText: Additional style classes to modify the appearance of the card. They are added in the root of the card.

arrayContent.label: Price
arrayContent.name: price
arrayContent.helpText: Fill it in if you want the card to show a price for the content you entered. It will be displayed at the bottom.
